languages.text: {n}...с резким звуком трубки выскальзывают из-под кожи женщины, разбрызгивая кровь и зловонную охристую жижу, и устройство отделяется от головы псайкерши. Идира издает пронзительный визг, резко дергает головой от боли — и хрупкий прибор со звоном разлетается на мельчайшие осколки.{/n}

{n}...with a sharp sound, the tubes slip out from under her skin, spraying blood mixed with some foul-smelling ochre-coloured slime, and the device detaches from Idira's head. She lets out a piercing cry, her head jerking back from the pain — and the delicate device clinks as it shatters into tiny fragments.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...с резким звуком трубки выскальзывают из-под кожи женщины, разбрызгивая кровь и зловонную охристую жижу, и устройство отделяется от головы псайкерши. Идира издает пронзительный визг, резко дергает головой от боли — и хрупкий прибор со звоном разлетается на мельчайшие осколки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}...with a sharp sound, the tubes slip out from under her skin, spraying blood mixed with some foul-smelling ochreish slime, and the device detaches from Idira's head. She lets out a piercing cry, jerks her head from the pain — and the delicate device clinks as it shatters to smithereens.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}…鋭い音とともに、チューブが彼女の皮膚の下からスルリと抜け、悪臭を放つ黄土色のスライムに混じった血液が噴射され、装置がイディラの頭から切り離される。彼女は悲痛な叫びを上げ、痛みで頭をのけぞり、繊細な装置は粉々に砕け散った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...with a sharp sound, the tubes slip out from under her skin, spraying blood mixed with some foul-smelling ochre-coloured slime, and the device detaches from Idira's head. She lets out a piercing cry, her head jerking back from the pain — and the delicate device clinks as it shatters into tiny fragments.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}…鋭い音とともに、チューブが彼女の皮膚の下からスルリと抜け、悪臭を放つ黄土色のスライムに混じった血液が噴射され、装置がイディラの頭から切り離される。彼女は悲痛な叫びを上げ、痛みで頭をのけぞり、繊細な装置は粉々に砕け散った。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}……随着“啪”地一声，伊迪拉头上的管子从皮肤下面滑了出来。鲜血喷到外面，夹杂着恶臭的褐色粘液。异形装置从伊迪拉头上掉了下来，她发出了刺耳的叫声，在剧痛中猛地抬起了头。随后，那个精致的装置掉在地上，摔成了碎片。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...with a sharp sound, the tubes slip out from under her skin, spraying blood mixed with some foul-smelling ochre-coloured slime, and the device detaches from Idira's head. She lets out a piercing cry, her head jerking back from the pain — and the delicate device clinks as it shatters into tiny fragments.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}……随着“啪”地一声，伊迪拉头上的管子从皮肤下面滑了出来。鲜血喷到外面，夹杂着恶臭的褐色粘液。异形装置从伊迪拉头上掉了下来，她发出了刺耳的叫声，在剧痛中猛地抬起了头。随后，那个精致的装置掉在地上，变成了碎片。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}... con un silbido, los tubos se despegan de su piel, salpicando sangre mezclada con una sustancia ocre de olor nauseabundo, y el dispositivo se separa de la cabeza de Idira. Emite un aullido perforante, sacude la cabeza del dolor... y el delicado dispositivo estalla en mil pedazos con un golpe agudo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...with a sharp sound, the tubes slip out from under her skin, spraying blood mixed with some foul-smelling ochre-coloured slime, and the device detaches from Idira's head. She lets out a piercing cry, her head jerking back from the pain — and the delicate device clinks as it shatters into tiny fragments.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}... con un silbido, los tubos se despegan de su piel, salpicando sangre mezclada con una sustancia ocre de olor nauseabundo, y el dispositivo se separa de la cabeza de Idira. Emite un aullido perforante, sacude la cabeza del dolor... y el delicado dispositivo estalla en pedazos con un golpe agudo.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}... mit einem ploppenden Geräusch rutschen die Röhren aus ihrer Haut. Blut gemischt mit stinkendem, ockerfarbenem Schleim spritzt herum und das Gerät löst sich von Idiras Kopf. Sie stößt einen durchdringenden Schrei aus, wirft ihren Kopf vor Schmerzen in den Nacken ... und das Gerät zerbricht in winzige Fragmente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...with a sharp sound, the tubes slip out from under her skin, spraying blood mixed with some foul-smelling ochre-coloured slime, and the device detaches from Idira's head. She lets out a piercing cry, her head jerking back from the pain — and the delicate device clinks as it shatters into tiny fragments.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}... mit einem ploppenden Geräusch rutschen die Röhren aus ihrer Haut. Blut gemischt mit stinkendem, ockerfarbenem Schleim spritzt herum und das Gerät löst sich von Idiras Kopf. Sie stößt einen durchdringenden Schrei aus, reißt den Kopf vor Schmerzen zur Seite — und das Gerät zerbricht klirrend in tausend Stücke.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Avec un claquement sec, les tubes se détachent de sa peau, répandant du sang mêlé à une substance ocre nauséabonde, et l'appareil se détache d'Idira qui hurle de douleur. Submergée par la souffrance, elle ne peut empêcher sa tête de venir heurter le fragile appareil... et le brise en mille morceaux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...with a sharp sound, the tubes slip out from under her skin, spraying blood mixed with some foul-smelling ochre-coloured slime, and the device detaches from Idira's head. She lets out a piercing cry, her head jerking back from the pain — and the delicate device clinks as it shatters into tiny fragments.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un claquement sec, les tubes se détachent de sa peau, répandant du sang mêlé à une substance ocre nauséabonde, et l'appareil se détache d'Idira qui hurle de douleur. Submergée par la souffrance, elle ne peut empêcher sa tête de venir heurter le fragile appareil... et le brise en mille morceaux.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}...Tüplerin tiz bir ses eşliğinde İdira'nın derisinin altından çıkmasıyla birlikte, leş kokulu ve aşı boyası renkli bir balçıkla karışık kanı, etrafa püskürüyor. İdira, cihaz başından ayrılırken tiz bir çığlık atıp acıdan bir anda başını geri çekiyor... Böylece narin cihaz, tıngırdaya tıngırdaya ufacık parçalara ayrılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...with a sharp sound, the tubes slip out from under her skin, spraying blood mixed with some foul-smelling ochre-coloured slime, and the device detaches from Idira's head. She lets out a piercing cry, her head jerking back from the pain — and the delicate device clinks as it shatters into tiny fragments.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}... Tüplerin tiz bir ses çıkararak İdira'nın derisinin altından çıkmasıyla birlikte, leş kokulu ve aşı boyası renkli bir balçıkla karışık kanı etrafa püskürtülüyor. İdira, cihaz başından ayrılırken tiz bir çığlık atıp acıdan başını aniden geri çekiyor... Böylece narin cihaz tıngırdaya tıngırdaya ufacık parçalara ayrılıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
